name: Calligraphic dance
description:
My works are inspired by my belief in the philosophy behind the creation of the letters and words in Persian calligraphy which are all inspired by the nature.
I believe in colors and the joy they can bring to everyone’s eye. To me, my works is nothing but calligraphic creation of the Persian letters and words which are originally inspired by the nature appeared in colors to mesmerize a harmony next to one another.
